item.title: Delete/Lock whatever
item.dc:creator: @piggle piggle
item.description:
@piggle wrote:

[quote=“Demon6994, post:1, topic:410033”]DemonZcraft

Ran on Hamachi, due to my computer being a fag not portforwarding. v.v

Anyways, if you use Hamachi, sure, you are welcome to join my minecraft!

Hamachi ID: DemonZcraft
Password: 123 <-- Everyone uses it. xD
IP: 5.44.174.116

If you are having problems connecting to the minecraft, let me know, and i’ll try and get things working. If it still doesn’t work. I give up on this whole minecraft thing.

What will be featured in DemonZcraft

Well, for one. I guess if you want to say, I will make it for those who want to do things such as either Explor maps that are posted online, or do survial ones. Or just a plain flat out. Free build where you can build whatever the crap you want. So if you want. Feel free to join. (: It will be 24/7!
Hosted personally from my PC.

You can use ANY mod, or texture pack. As of now, there are no rules, so you can do whatever you want freely.

Edit #1: You can use any client, you do not have to be a Premium minecraft user to play on the server. If you have any map ideas, PM them to me here, or just flat out build something on the current one.

Edit #2: I know Hamachi sucks, get over it. It wont port forward. Whoop. End of story…

Edit #3: I will be trying to get it so that will not be needed to use Hamachi, as soon as my roughter stops being a nub.

Edit #4: Free build, so if you wish to build with someone, or build alone, or even build a town. I don’t care. Go ahead.

Edit #5: Your work can be destoried, but the noobs who destroy your stuff, PM me, tell me who, and i’ll put them on a ban list, and then you can get back to building.

Edit #6: I will be working on this more than anything else at the moment. So please. Don’t give me crap. e.e

Edit #7: At the moment, nothing spawns. Enjoy that. This will allow anyone who wants to play, a chance to start. :D[/quote]
may i join plox?

Read full topic

item.title: Delete/Lock whatever
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:5, topic:410033”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=511299.msg3711208#msg3711208 date=1313361487]

Edit #4: Free build, so if you wish to build with someone, or build alone, or even build a town. I don’t care. Go ahead.

Edit #5: Your work can be destoried, but the noobs who destroy your stuff, PM me, tell me who, and i’ll put them on a ban list, and then you can get back to building.

is this a bukkit server?
if so, why not set up residence? that way you don’t have to worry about banning people that build on others properties because residence doesn’t give them the chance. just suggesting.
also the plugin is really easy to set up, and i havn’t heard of it interfering with any other plugin so far

residence is a shitty plugin
Just get big brother.
[/quote]

explain pls? i havnt had a problem with it yet :o[/quote]

for one it stops raiding which makes minecraft alot more fun

Read full topic
